name: Voice AI Dashboard
reasoning_rules: Use large readable fonts (16px+);Show live status indicators;Prioritize uptime metrics;Use blues/teals for trust
anti_patterns: Avoid slow animations;No tiny text;No playful aesthetics

name: Automation Operations Panel
reasoning_rules: Show execution timelines;Use purples (n8n brand);Display error tracking prominently;Modular card layout
anti_patterns: Avoid cluttered layouts;No abstract visualizations;Keep concrete

name: Executive ROI Report
reasoning_rules: Single column narrative flow;Big numbers with context;Before/after comparisons;Print-friendly layout
anti_patterns: Avoid dense grids;No technical jargon;No dark mode only

name: Internal Ops Console
anti_patterns: Avoid excessive whitespace;No slow loading;No client-facing polish

name: Productized Workflow
description: White-label client portal for workflow access
anti_patterns: Avoid exposing backend logic;No agency branding;No technical complexity

name: Financial Dashboard
reasoning_rules: Use blues/grays (trust);High contrast text (WCAG AA);Avoid bright red/green for money;Professional typography
anti_patterns: No AI purple gradients;No comic sans;No playful aesthetics

name: Patient Data Dashboard
reasoning_rules: Calming blues/greens;High contrast (accessibility);Minimal animations (cognitive load);Clear hierarchy
anti_patterns: No dark mode only;No harsh red;No complex animations

name: Sales Analytics
reasoning_rules: Show conversion funnels;Revenue trends;Product performance;Customer segments
anti_patterns: Avoid abstract metrics;Keep actionable;No vanity metrics

name: Campaign Performance
reasoning_rules: Multi-channel view;ROI calculations;A/B test results;Audience insights
anti_patterns: Avoid data overload;Keep focused;No technical jargon

name: Legal Case Management
anti_patterns: No playful elements;No bright colors;No casual fonts
